segment.source: Microsoft Application Virtualization Client Management Help
segment.target: Microsoft Application Virtualization Client Management Help

segment.source: Microsoft Application Virtualization Client Management Help
segment.target: Microsoft Application Virtualization Client Management Help

segment.source: The Microsoft Application Virtualization Desktop Client and the Client for Remote Desktop Services (formerly Terminal Services) provide the interface you can use to manage virtual applications on your computer.
segment.target: The Microsoft Application Virtualization Desktop Client and the Client for Remote Desktop Services (formerly Terminal Services) provide the interface you can use to manage virtual applications on your computer.

segment.source: Through the user interface, you can manage applications and file type associations, and you can refresh applications from the Application Virtualization Management Servers (also referred to as application publishing servers).
segment.target: Through the user interface, you can manage applications and file type associations, and you can refresh applications from the Application Virtualization Management Servers (also referred to as application publishing servers).

segment.source: This help documentation supports the Application Virtualization Desktop Client and Client for Remote Desktop Services.
segment.target: This help documentation supports the Application Virtualization Desktop Client and Client for Remote Desktop Services.

segment.source: It includes conceptual information, step-by-step procedures, and a user interface reference.
segment.target: It includes conceptual information, step-by-step procedures, and a user interface reference.

segment.source: For the latest updates to this help documentation, please visit the Microsoft TechNet Library at http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=150698.
segment.target: For the latest updates to this help documentation, please visit the Microsoft TechNet Library at http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=150698.

segment.target: Application Virtualization Client Management Console Roadmap

segment.source: Describes virtual environments and the way virtual applications affect the environment.
segment.target: Describes virtual environments and the way virtual applications affect the environment.

segment.source: How to Use the Desktop Notification Area for Application Virtualization Client Management
segment.target: How to Use the Desktop Notification Area for Application Virtualization Client Management

segment.target: Includes information about using the features and commands that are available from the Windows desktop notification area.

segment.source: Includes an overview as well as step-by-step procedures for using the features and commands that are available in the Application Virtualization Client.
segment.target: Includes an overview as well as step-by-step procedures for using the features and commands that are available in the Application Virtualization Client.
